评论详情: This dress is really cute and well made. Normally wear a medium but should have sized up to a large. Kinda tight in the top area. It washes well. The material is little itchy but I'll keep it and wear it on cooler days.
I love this dress....
No shape. Fits like a box. Ugly. Material is scratchy.
Fit was great so cute worth the money
No issues with the fit, but looked like a cheap swim cover up in person.
Fits perfectly.  Size large.  Machine wash. Dry low for cpl and hang dry.  Nice stretch to material.  Soft.

I love this type of easily washable tee shirt material dress. It's soft, flexible, comfy - and it has POCKETS! The layered flaps on the sleeves are a unique touch that fancies it up a little bit. The rich purple color with the black floral print looks beautiful.
I bought this dress for my mom, and being petite, it fit her mid-calf. The length on the medium is 36.5 inches. Otherwise, the color and design matches the picture.

评论概述: Cute dress but fabric is thin
评论详情: I think this is a cute dress, however, the fabric is not quality fabric.  It is not only thin, but I found a small hole in the skirt portion.  Wear a slip with this one.  It is fine for casual occasions.  My  bust is 41 inches and according to the chart, I should have ordered x-large.  I ordered large and it fits.  I think x-large would have been too big.  I wear petite and the length fell beneath my knees.
Dress fit perfect.  Good quality and price.
I like this dress. Could be casual, but also could be dressier. Really can go either way. Great value for price. Fits loose and comfortable, not clingy.

I love this dress. Years ago I sewed most of outfits but I am too busy now to do do. This dress is comfortable, becoming and even has pockets! Plus it washes easily and is becoming right out of the dryer! What more could you want???!!!
Fue un regalo para mi amiga que quedó encantada con el! Tela suave fresca y muy lucido el vestidito
La tela es súper fresca y estira mucho
I like how comfortable and cute this dress is. Black and white are classic and I love the pockets.

评论概述: A pretty summer dress which fit perfectly and was exactly the right length
评论详情: This dress arrived packaged well and actually fit me perfectly in size and length

I took a chance on one of the sale prices on this dress, and so glad I did. Very comfortable and cool for the Summer. I bought it to wear to a casual event and wore with just some sandals and got several compliments. Well worth for the money.
very comfortable and cute. Washes really well.  Wrinkle free !
Fit as expected love the pockets. I am just about 5" so the length was good for me

For the price I’ll keep it as a house dress and to run errands. Would never wear it “out” as I had planned. The fabric of this dress is a thick knit and not soft. Maybe it will feel better after it is washed. The neckline in front is awkwardly high and almost feels like it’s on backwards. I’m not rating it less than three stars because if you pay $27 for a dress, what do you expect?

评论概述: Material too clingy, like static cling
评论详情: Design good, pockets a major plus, material too saggy to bear weight of phone without distorting dress

It’s not a good ,flattering length.  If you’re real tall, it would be fine.  Or possibly short.  But it hits me right at the knee.  I’m 5’3”. It would be sooo much cuter if it was shorter.  It’s a great dress, though, well made, lightweight.
To wear when it's hotter then the hubs of Haiti  very comfortable and cool wearing one now
Washed this dress once, it faded and material looked like it had been washed and worn 50 times! Do not buy, wore it once and now in the garbage!

评论概述: Very comfortable and nice looking dress.
评论详情: I liked the weight of the fabric and the design.
I just love this dress.  It's so cute. The sleeves are very unique. Very comfortable with oversized pockets.  You're going to want two or three.
The dress is cute and colorful .  colors were vivid and dress is well made.
Love the style and fit.  Have worn to beach over swim suit and out to dinner with strapped sandals and jewelry.  Very versatile.  Like the pockets, perfect size for cell phone.
Nice material, got it quickly.  The fit was good!
Fits well and is very soft.

Snug thru shoulders and bust wear minimizes bra fit better  over all happy
Todo me agradó, lo use para ir de paseo.
I love the colors and pattern (purple with black floral), the tulip sleeves, and the pockets. It fits me nicely (I'm 5 ft tall), and I think it would fit a lot of different sizes and shapes well.

This is a nice casual dress with pockets great for everyday wear.  Its thin and lightweight but not see through.  It does have nice sized pockets.  The color faded a little when I washed it but it still looks cute.  It fits true to size and is loose and breezy.  If you want a more fitted look size down.
The dress did not fit. I wanted to exchange it. If I wanted to pay to return the dress to China, they would refund my money.  I won't order from this company again.
Material is very thin and feels cheap.
Great for an evening out to dinner or a show! Very flattering!
So my dress arrived yesterday and I’m so excited the fit is perfect and I love that it has pockets ❤️
This dress is really cute, with a vibrant print, and the thing we all want- pockets!  It fits nicely and is comfortable to wear.  Looking forward to summer!
I bought this as a gift for a friend. She loves it. Fits well and she says it's very comfortable.

评论概述: Great quality! Super cute patterns! Does not wrinkle like crazy!
评论详情: Disclaimer: All opinions are my own and I pride myself on unbiased reviews that can help others decide whether something is worth it.  I’m used to stuff like this wrinkling like crazy usually. This one is surprisingly high quality and beautiful in person. It feels really nice, soft, and looks great on! The sizing is pretty spot on as well. Cute, simple, easy, and flattering! The sleeves are also super cute. This also comes in a bunch of really nice patterns! It’s sooo comfortable on!! Simple, cute, casual dress! At this quality and the way it looks, this is totally worth the price.

I love this dress in purple and black floral! It is true to size and the perfect weight for a summer dress. The tulip type sleeves are different for me and I'm not sure they're my favorite, but they do add a little bit of visual interest to the dress. The fabric isn't clingy and drapes nicely. This one is a winner!
It’s nice quality and doesn’t wrinkle.  I’m usually a size large, but I ordered the extra large because during the summer I do not like things tightly fitted.
Didn't like style and color on me.

评论概述: Dress was as advertised, but very thin
评论详情: Overall, I'm very happy with my new summer dress from Bluetime. The design looked exactly as presented in the pictures and it is very pretty. I was a bit surprised at just how thin the material was though, so I'm taking just one star off. It will do well as a summer dress, but I only plan to wear it on very warm days. The pockets are also helpful and let me carry a few small things. Everything else I need I'll just give to my husband to carry for me!

This black dress with white spots and florals at the bottom is just simply easy to wear.  I can dress it up with heels or down with some flat sandals.  The material is stretchy and comfortable, and it fits true to size.  It will definitely be a go-to dress for me this summer!
This summer dress is a cute addition to my wardrobe.  I love that it does not make me look bigger than what I actually am.  The dress is very light weight and comfortable.
This dress was so comfortable and I loved how cute the flowers were. The biggest pro is the pockets though! Love the pockets!

评论概述: This is so cute, and I love the pattern
评论详情: Very cute and flattering. True to size. I love the cut of this, as it fits loosely over my stomach. It's fitted right around your rib cage and then flares out from there. And it's a nice length. I have a rather large rear and sometimes dresses can be too short for me but this one fits very nicely.

I love this little blue springtime dress! It’s fits perfectly and is so well made. The colors are bright and the design is flattering. I can’t wait for warmer weather to get here so I can wear this one!

评论概述: True to Size, Lightweight Comfortable Dress with Pockets
评论详情: This dress is just as shown and described here.  I love that it is soft, comfortable, swingy, with pockets on the low hip.  The pattern arrived just as shown in the photos, no disappointments there.Why only 4 stars?  1) There was no size chart when I ordered so I went with the XL and it is too big for me.  I normally wear a ladies size 12, am 5'7, 155 lbs, 40x33x40.  The size Large would have been right for me, but usually things with no size chart run small on Amazon (at least in my experience) so I sized up.  That's my mistake, but a size chart would have helped avoid that.  2) This fabric, while feeling great and offering a flattering drape, looks a little cheap.  It is a touch shiny and the color saturation is not great.  If the pigmentation were stronger it wouldn't matter that it was a little shiny.  If the dress was matte in finish, it wouldn't matter that the pigment isn't so deep, but the combination leaves a little to be desired.

I love this dress! It is so cute. I love the colors and pattern. It fits well and is both comfortable and flattering. I like the style of the shoulders and the fact that it has pockets. It's also a great length. This is the perfect sundress for summer- at the beach or by the pool, or a day outdoors with friends. It is just what I was looking for! It seems well made, and I highly recommend.
This is a really cute dress. Love the fabric!! Fits very well. Love the pattern. Very flattering

评论概述: Very cute summer dress with pockets
评论详情: This is a great lightweight but not see-through summer dress. The style is modest but not frumpy. The black dress with the flower pattern and pops of color on the skirt is super cute. And who doesn't love a dress with pockets! My 16-year-old wears a size 6 and the small fits her perfectly.

I ordered this in a medium because I wanted it to be more fitted as it does not have a very defined waist. I am very happy with the fit (I am 5'2 and a 8/10 in women's sizing).  The navy is beautiful and I love the white and pink details on the print. The dress is nice and light weight. I have washed and dried it once with no fading or shrinking. I am definitely going to order in more colors!!
My Wife Loves This Casual Summer Dress The Pattern Is Fun And Cheerful. She Loves The pockets Comfortable To Wear Material Is Good Quality Made Well Fits True To Size Washed Beautifully. No Wrinkles

I got this dress, thinking it would be something to wear around the house.  It is so much better than that.  It's a very flattering dress and it has pockets!  It's a little loose but it still looks so nice. I should have ordered down one size. I'm 5'2" and it hits just below my knee which is where I usually wear dresses.It's a very pretty print and the material is very comfortable.  While the material seems thin, it's not see-through and it looks better than the price would have you believe. Honestly, I didn't think it would be this good.  I've washed it, hung it to dry and there are no wrinkles.  I can't say that about most of my wardrobe.  It's a plus that I don't need to iron it. This is a beautiful casual dress.

评论概述: Shockingly nice for its price range, and with pockets!!
评论详情: My girlfriend was very happy with this little gift, the fabric is soft and light and this simple dress is still very, very pretty! I got the blue one and I like it on her a lot, great dress for a nice casual day out. What made her happiest, though? Pockets!!!!

This dress is awesome.  So cute and comfortable.  The material is light and the print is nice.  I'm 5'3 and wanted it to be to my knees and it is, size is XL.  It is very easy to pack and doesn't wrinkle so it is ideal for traveling. It is very easy to dress up or dress down, fits any occasion.  I highly recommend.
It's a simple and comfortable dress. The print is beautiful, but the fabric is simple. It's perfect for doing everyday tasks.

Basic T-shirt dress with a cool pattern. it slides over your head, no zippers or anything. The fabric feels great and the quality is good, especially for the price. And it has pockets! I love the purple and black pattern, it looks great and exactly as pictured. It fits true to size. This is a great summer dress that will work for many occasions.

Wow. I am so bummed about this dress. The fabric does not feel like the fabric it's supposed to be, it feels more like a cotton polyester blend which is not what I was looking for with this dress. It also isn't nearly as fitted. The whole thing is just basically a baggy house dress. It makes me look like a little old lady and I don't like that one bit! Big bummer. It looks so pretty in the picture, and although the pattern is identical, the look of the dress itself isn't even close.
This dress is flattering, and is the right length. I love the pops of red, and that's actually the reason I ordered this one. Love that it has pockets. Will look great with sandals.
The dress is very pretty.  It’s thin so it’ll be great for summer.  The pockets on the side are deep enough to put my phone in there.  It’s a flowy dress, which I like.

This is a simple, lightweight, pullover dress. It is comfy and casual. And it has pockets!  The print is bright and cheery. The fit was true to size. It washed beautifully. with no wrinkles (I didn't put it through the dryer.) I'm 5'4" and it falls at the top of my knees. I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.

I got the black and white floral and I love the graduation of the print from polka dot on the bodice to a floral at the skirt.  The fabric has a light stretch to it and it easily goes on over the head without snaps, buttons, or zips.  The dress has a jewel neckline which is high, but it doesn’t feel snug or uncomfortable.  They call the sleeves petal sleeves.  We always called them tulip sleeves, but I think they’re both accurate descriptions.  They’re very pretty and add a nice touch to an otherwise simple dress design.  The dress hangs from the shoulders and is very loose and comfortable without looking tent-like.  I’m 5’ 8” tall and I feel like the dress is a little on the short side for me.  It hits me about 2 ½ to 3 inches above the knee.  It’s not extremely short though, especially for a summer dress.  It has pockets on both sides that are a nice size, but the fabric is so light that if I put something as heavy as my phone in them, the extra weight pulls heavily at the dress.  They’re nice for things like a lipstick though.

I really love this dress! The top is very conservative,  I feel like most sundresses are really skimpy on top. That's not a bad thing,  it makes this dress great for different occasions than my other sundresses. I'm 6ft, 230lbs and 40dd. I got the large and this fits me really well.  For me it is a bit on the short side,  but I'm also tall so take that with a grain of salt.

The dress arrived without wrinkles.It pops over the head so no zipper, button, or other fasteners to contend with. It fit absolutely perfectly true to size and at 5'3' it just hits the top of my knee. Having pockets is such a positive feature.When I say I feel totally comfortable in this dress I don't just mean that the fabric is silky and it fits well.I mean that because of that I am confident in my appearance.That confidence spills over into many aspects of daily life.
